name: Tower Roulette
description:
This is a game about preventing random events from destroying your party. You have a myriad of abilities (move your mouse over the button to see it's functionality) and your party is healed after every 3 floors (if they are alive).

Assets I Used

n.n. "90's Video Game Music - Royalty-Free, Non-Copyright."

Royalty Free Music - UnRoyalty. Youtube, September 30th, 2017. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g7uPN0oqn3g

n.n. "Short Success Sound Glockenspiel Treasure Video Game." FunWithSound. Freesound, January 20th, 2019. https://freesound.org/people/FunWithSound/sounds/456965/

n.n. "Damage." qubodup. Freesound, December 24th, 2013. https://freesound.org/people/qubodup/sounds/211634/
